alert.note: Alert for Eastern Interior (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 16 at 11:45AM ADT until October 16 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...The urban areas of eastern interior of Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Through 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
